typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pNomeArquivo as string
}
source(output(
		CONTA_COBRANCA as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		OPEN_ITEM_ID as string,
		DESCR_OPEN_ITEM as string,
		VALOR_ITEM as string,
		VALOR_CONTESTADO as string,
		VALOR_PAGO_ITEM as string,
		FECHAMENTO_SALDO_ABERTO_ITEM as timestamp 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		UF_NF as string,
		SERIE_NF as string,
		SUBSERIE_NF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['kenan/validados_a_processar','kenan/processados']) ~> srcArqKenanItem
source(output(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(38,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE NM_ARQUIVO = '{$pNomeArquivo}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> BuscaLoteArqAtual
BuscaLoteArqAtual derive(SyntheticKey = 1) ~> FakeKey2
srcArqKenanItem derive(SyntheticKey = 1,
		VALOR_ITEM = toDecimal(VALOR_ITEM),
		VALOR_CONTESTADO = toDecimal(VALOR_CONTESTADO),
		VALOR_PAGO_ITEM = toDecimal(VALOR_PAGO_ITEM)) ~> FakeKey1
FakeKey1, FakeKey2 join(FakeKey1@SyntheticKey == FakeKey2@SyntheticKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_FATURA_ITEM_KENAN as decimal(28,0),
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0),
		CONTA_COBRANCA as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		ID_FATURA as string,
		ID_OPEN_ITEM as string,
		DESC_OPEN_ITEM as string,
		VLR_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CONTESTADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_PAGO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		DT_FECHA_SALDO_ITEM as date,
		NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		UF_NF as string,
		SERIE_NF as string,
		SUBSERIE_NF as string,
		STEP_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(19,0),
		JOB_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(19,0)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO,
		CONTA_COBRANCA,
		CPF_CNPJ = CNPJ_CPF,
		ID_FATURA = NUMERO_FATURA,
		ID_OPEN_ITEM = OPEN_ITEM_ID,
		DESC_OPEN_ITEM = DESCR_OPEN_ITEM,
		VLR_ITEM = VALOR_ITEM,
		VLR_CONTESTADO = VALOR_CONTESTADO,
		VLR_PAGO_ITEM = VALOR_PAGO_ITEM,
		DT_FECHA_SALDO_ITEM = FECHAMENTO_SALDO_ABERTO_ITEM,
		NOTA_FISCAL,
		UF_NF,
		SERIE_NF,
		SUBSERIE_NF
	)) ~> GravaTabContestacoesAtlysRcbl
